name: Test job types from the bunge website against Peviitor API Response

statusDetails.trace:
get_job_details = ((['Bunge Romania Opportunities', 'VAT Specialist with Hungarian', 'Contract Administrator- Bucharest', 'Reliability M...r-Cala-915300/1015419901/', ...], ['Bunge', 'Bunge', 'Bunge', 'Bunge', 'Bunge', 'Bunge', ...], ['on-site', 'on-site']))

    @pytest.mark.regression
    @pytest.mark.API
    def test_bunge_type_api(get_job_details):
        allure.dynamic.title(f"Test job types from the {company_name} website against Peviitor API Response")
    
        scraped_jobs_data, peviitor_jobs_data = get_job_details
        with allure.step("Step 1: Get job types from the scraper"):
            job_types_scraper = scraped_jobs_data[4]
            job_titles_scraper = scraped_jobs_data[0]
    
        with allure.step("Step 2: Get job types from the Peviitor API"):
            job_types_peviitor = peviitor_jobs_data[5]
    
        with allure.step("Step 3: Compare job types from scraper response against Peviitor API Response"):
            allure.attach(f"Expected Results: {job_types_scraper}", name="Expected Results")
            allure.attach(f"Actual Results: {job_types_peviitor}", name="Actual Results")
>           TestUtils().check_job_types(job_types_scraper, job_types_peviitor, job_titles_scraper)

job_titles_scraper = ['Bunge Romania Opportunities', 'VAT Specialist with Hungarian', 'Contract Administrator- Bucharest', 'Reliability Manager- Lehliu Plant', 'Jr. Engineer', 'Maintenance & Utilities Manager- Lehliu']

    def check_job_types(self, expected_types, actual_types, job_titles_scraper):
        if not expected_types and not actual_types:
            msg = f"Scraper is not grabbing any job types"
            allure.step(msg)
            raise AssertionError(msg)
    
        # Setting dummy job titles for popping to not influence other tests
        dummy_job_titles = job_titles_scraper[:]
        missing_types = self.get_different_items(expected_types, actual_types, dummy_job_titles)
        msg = "An unknown error occured"
    
        if missing_types:
            msg = f"Peviitor is having extra job types for the following titles: {missing_types[1]}"
        else:
            missing_types = self.get_different_items(actual_types, expected_types, dummy_job_titles)
            if missing_types:
                msg = f"Peviitor is missing job types: {missing_types[1]}"
    
        allure.step(msg)
